ARABIC: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِى ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ عَبْدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There is no one in the heavens and earth who will not come to the All-Merciful as a slave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: There is no one in the heavens and the earth but comes before Ar-Rahman in all obedience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There is no one in the heavens and the earth but he shall come to the Most Compassionate Lord as His servant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: All that is in the heavens and the earth will return to the Beneficent God as His submissive servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: All those who are in the heavens and the earth will come to the Most Gracious as His bondmen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: There is none in the heavens and the earth but comes unto the Most Gracious as a slave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: There is no one in the heavens and the earth but will come to the Beneficent Allah as a servant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: None is there in the heavens and earth but he comes to the All-merciful as a servant;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: There is none in the heavens and the earth but cometh unto the Beneficent as a slave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: there is none in the heavens or on the earth but shall return to the Merciful in utter submission,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: None there is in the heavens and the earth but must come unto the Compassionate as a bondman. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is none in the heavens and the earth but he comes to the All-beneficent as a servant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Not one of the beings in the heavens and the earth but must come to (Allah) Most Gracious as a servant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: There is none in the heavens and the earth but comes unto the Most Beneficent (Allah) as a slave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There is none in the heavens and earth except he comes to the Merciful as a worshiper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: There is none in the heavens and the earth but will come to the Most Merciful as a servant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: There is no one in the heavens and earth but that he comes to the Most Merciful as a servant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:93] There is none in the heavens and the earth but he comes to the Compassionate One as a servant, servile, submissive, on the Day of Resurrection, including [individuals such as] Ezra and Jesus.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (There is none in the heavens and the earth but cometh unto the Beneficent as a slave) acknowledging his servitude to the All-Merciful and obedient to Him except, that is, the disbelievers.
